record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, APRIL 14, 2008, AT 2 P.M.
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, APRIL 14, 2008, AT 2 P.M. -- (Senate - April 10, 2008)

[Page: S2954]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that it stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 6:55 p.m., adjourned until Monday, April 14, 2008, at 2 p.m.
